description: a(n+1) = a(n)-b(n+1) if a(n) >= b(n+1) else a(n)+b(n+1), where {b(n)} are the triangular numbers A000217.
links: Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000.
maple: A008345 := proc(n) option remember; if n = 1 then n-1 elif A008345(n-1) >= n*(n+1)/2 then A008345(n-1)-n*(n+1)/2 else A008345(n-1)+n*(n+1)/2; fi; end;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _J. H. Conway_
